name: Dots (itch) (ItsJustSawyer)
description: Dots is a small game I made for fun. You a dot in space trying to survive as long as possible.  To play use your mouse pointer to aim at the dot you wish to do damage to. To launch yourself towards the dot to do damage press the left mouse button or the space key on your keyboard. The farther you have your mouse from the player the faster you will launch.
